attributes.action: stop discrimination against people of valid age buying alcohol if with another person who has no id
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stopping the discrimination, we as individuals have a right to buy alcohol if we are of age and should be held accountable for our own actions, not being banned from purchasing just because you are with your children or friends. Not everyone has id with them and some people know people that aren't 18. What's next you can't buy lighter fluid for your bbq cause your with someone who's 13?
